mapper.sql: COMPANY.ID, COMPANY_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, DEVELOPER_ID, STATUS, OPERATE_TIME, AUDITING_TIME, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID
mapper.insert: insert into COMPANY (ID, COMPANY_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, DEVELOPER_ID, STATUS, OPERATE_TIME, AUDITING_TIME, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into COMPANY
ID,
COMPANY_NAME,
ADDRESS,
PHONE,
DEVELOPER_ID,
STATUS,
OPERATE_TIME,
AUDITING_TIME,
PROVINCE_ID,
CITY_ID,
AREA_ID,

mapper.update:
update COMPANY
COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVELOPER_ID = #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AUDITING_TIME = #{auditingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update COMPANY set COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVELOPER_ID = #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AUDITING_TIME = #{auditingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT , PROVINCE.provinceName, CITY.cityName, AREA.areaName FROM COMPANY JOIN PROVINCE ON COMPANY.PROVINCE_ID = PROVINCE.provinceID JOIN CITY ON COMPANY.CITY_ID = CITY.cityID JOIN AREA ON COMPANY.AREA_ID = AREA.areaID WHERE COMPANY.DEVELOPER_ID = #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND COMPANY.AUDITING_TIME = (SELECT MAX(COMPANY.AUDITING_TIME) FROM COMPANY WHERE DEVELOPER_ID = #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY COMPANY.DEVELOPER_ID)
